books.author: by Brandon Sanderson
books.description: The fourth book in the Stormlight Archive series. Technological discoveries and an ensuing arms race change how a war is fought.
books.name: RHYTHM OF WAR

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The F.B.I. agent Atlee Pine’s search for her twin sister overlaps with a military investigator’s hunt for someone involved in a global conspiracy.
books.name: DAYLIGHT

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poems and illustrations by the author of “Milk and Honey” and “The Sun and Her Flowers.”
books.name: HOME BODY

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The sixth book in the Mickey Haller series. Haller defends himself when police find the body of a former client in his car’s trunk.
books.name: THE LAW OF INNOCENCE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The third book in the Jake Brigance series. A 16-year-old is accused of killing a deputy in Clanton, Miss., in 1990.
books.name: A TIME FOR MERCY

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Just as Coco is about to graduate from Columbia, tragic events in her family send her on a journey of self-discovery.
books.name: ALL THAT GLITTERS

books.author: by Marc Cameron
books.description: A missing scientist, strange noises under the Arctic ice and a mole who infiltrated American intelligence bedevil President Jack Ryan.
books.name: TOM CLANCY: SHADOW OF THE DRAGON

books.author: by Lee Child and Andrew Child
books.description: Jack Reacher intervenes on an ambush in Tennessee and uncovers a conspiracy.
books.name: THE SENTINEL

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A doctor serving in the Navy in Afghanistan goes back to North Carolina where two women change his life.
books.name: THE RETURN

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: The 27th book in the Stephanie Plum series. Stephanie deals with a soldier of fortune from Little Havana.
books.name: FORTUNE AND GLORY

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark and Alafair Burke
books.description: As their wedding approaches, a television producer and her fiancée must search for his missing 7-year-old nephew.
books.name: PIECE OF MY HEART

books.author: by Brit Bennett
books.description: The lives of twin sisters who run away from a Southern Black community at age 16 diverge as one returns and the other takes on a different racial identity but their fates intertwine.
books.name: THE VANISHING HALF

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A failed bank robber holds a group of strangers hostage at an apartment open house.
books.name: ANXIOUS PEOPLE

books.author: by V.E. Schwab
books.description: A Faustian bargain comes with a curse that affects the adventure Addie LaRue has across centuries.
books.name: THE INVISIBLE LIFE OF ADDIE LARUE

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: In a prequel to “The Pillars of the Earth,” a boatbuilder, a Norman noblewoman and a monk live in England under attack by the Welsh and the Vikings.
books.name: THE EVENING AND THE MORNING
